item.title: Preparation of GCP certificated associate cloud engineer [WIP]
item.description: Useful Links About ACE Certification Exam Overview Official Exam Guide Google Cloud Training Online Courses Name Platform Price Mock Exam Cloud Engineering with Google Cloud Professional Certificate Coursera $50/month N Recommended Google Cloud Certified Associate Cloud Engineer LinuxAcademy $50 Y (50Q) Ultimate Google Certified Associate Cloud Engineer 2020 GCP @Udemy ~$60 Y (70Q) Mostly on sale (<$15) Google Certified Associate Cloud Engineer Certification A Cloud Guru @Udemy ~$230 Y (100Q) Mostly on sale (<$20) Hand-on Labs@Qwiklabs Qwiklabs Charged by credit N Free credits are available from time to time Practice Exams Platform Price # of Questions Official Practice Exam Free 25 Too easy but make sure to run through this Whizlabs $20 150 BrainCert $30 250 People Joseph Holbrook (The Cloud Tech Guy): medium, YouTube, Udemy Repos sathishvj/awesome-gcp-certifications ddneves/awesome-gcp-certifications (outdated) Cheatsheets Whizlabs Viniciuscoding/granja_Google_Associate_Cloud_Engineer WebLeash/gcp_associate_engineer TiagoGouvea/google-cloud-associate-cloud-engineer-preparation DRpandaMD/gcp-certified-associate-cloud-engineer-2020 Shekhar Sarker: Notes from my Google Cloud Certification Exam Charles.

item.title: Use Hugo for the first time
item.description: Shortcodes Hugo native shortcodes Embed Google Presentation figure & gallery Enable MathJax Add following lines into theme/<theme>/layout/partials/math.html <script src="//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/mathjax/2.7.0/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML" type="text/javascript" ></script> <script type="text/x-mathjax-config"> MathJax.Hub.Config({ tex2jax: {inlineMath: [['$','$']]} }); </script> and put following lines in any template that the target page used: {{ if or .Params.math .Site.Params.math }} {{ partial "math.html" . }} {{ end }} and then put the parameter math: true on the target page to enable MathJax.

item.title: MTIMESX: MATLAB快速多維矩陣乘積
item.description: 在多維矩陣運算當中，雖然用多個 for-loops 處理較為直觀易懂，但其實非常耗時。在我修習台大醫工所的人體動做分析電腦計算方法時，發現了 MATLAB 有MTIMESX這

item.description: All photos credit to deeplearning.ai 1. 修課背景 我自己是機械背景，在機械所碩士班一年級期間修習了台大資工林軒田教授開設的機器學習基石和機器學習技法兩門課 (也是從那個時候

item.title: Student Projects
item.description: Human Motion Analysis Programming MATLAB programs for human motion analysis, including motion tracking, evaluation of body balance, and derivation of joint forces and torques of the lower body, etc. It uses the data derived from a motion capture system and force plates. [GitHub] Web Crawler of USPTO PatFT Database Web crawler with PyQt5 UI for automatically gathering information of issued US patents and batch download in the format of PDF.

About I’m Wei-Hsiang (Matt) Wang, from Taiwan. I’m a software engineer at Umbo Computer Vision focusing primarily on the development of realtime human detection pipeline in Python & Node.js. I received both of my B.S. (2016) & M.S. (2018) in Mechanical Engineering from National Taiwan University (NTU). Also a cat slave to a tabby named Mujo & a calico named Muya.
